name: Preta
description: The Preta is a Medium-sized undead creature with a hunger for blood, characterized by its shadowy presence and the ability to manipulate blood necromantically. Its appearance is subtle yet unsettling, embodying the essence of a haunting specter.
memorable: The Preta can heal itself by drawing blood from its victims, making it a challenging foe in prolonged encounters.
goals: To ambush and siphon the life force from unsuspecting victims.
relations: Typically encountered by those who delve into the undead realms or come across dark necromantic cults.
environment: Often found in dark, shadowy areas or haunted sites where undead linger.
strengths: Immunities to poison damage and several conditions enhance its durability, and its Blood Siphon ability allows for self-healing.
weaknesses: Moderate defenses and reliance on stealth tactics make it vulnerable to perceptive foes adept in combat.
attacks: Employs a combination of Blood Siphon that deals necrotic damage and claw attacks that slash at its prey.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Siphon allows the Preta to drain life, dealing necrotic damage while also healing itself.
senses: Possesses Ethereal Sight to perceive threats in the Ethereal Plane.
skills: Proficient in stealth, allowing it to move undetected and manipulate its surroundings.
additional_information: Can become invisible until it attacks, enhancing its stealth capabilities.
Can create illusory sounds and images to confuse opponents.
Gains tactical advantages by shifting between the Ethereal Plane and Material Plane.
Immune to exhaustion, frightened, and other debilitating conditions.
test_queries: undead that can shift to Ethereal Plane
